arts.sum: Sheffield Wednesday conceded early in both halves on Good Friday as relegation-threatened Stoke stormed to a 2-0 home win. The Owls are in a miserable vein of form heading into gameweek 44 - Danny Röh...

arts.ttl: Jordan Thompson update as Stoke City boss sends message to bumper crowd
arts.sum: Mark Robins is keeping his fingers crossed for Jordan Thompson, who was stretchered off during a win that gave Stoke City a huge push towards Championship safety. Robins said: "I wanted a bit more balance in terms of right foot, left foot today.

arts.ttl: Stoke take big step towards survival with win over Sheffield Wednesday
Stoke City team news vs Sheffield Wednesday as Mark Robins makes two changes
arts.sum: “We go to Leeds on Monday and it’s Sheffield United on Friday night and both are trying to get automatic promotion although in Sheffield United’s last three games they have slipped up a little bit but they’ve got good players. “So Sheffield Wednesday is a big game for us, not least because it’s the next on and we’ve got a full house.

arts.ttl: Stoke City vs Sheffield Wednesday live - Team news from bet365 Stadium sell-out - Stoke-on-Trent Live
arts.sum: Click here to join in the debate through the day. Stoke have returned home after a key win at Cardiff last Saturday to play in front of a packed house in a match that has the potential to going a long way to securing their status in the Championship.

arts.ttl: Sheffield Wednesday injury check on trio ahead of Stoke City clash
arts.sum: Sheffield Wednesday will make late calls on three players including captain Barry Bannan ahead of Friday's Championship match at Stoke City. Stoke follow this match with a trip to Elland Road to take on Leeds United on Monday before returning home to host Sheffield United next Friday and finishing the campaign away at Derby County.
